text: Ra jaba musale aphna jatika manisaharusita bhane he mera jati valaharu timiharule bachola'i pujera aphumathi atyacara gareka chau tasartha aphno srastatira pharka aphna jyana (aparadhika jyana) la'i aphanai hathale hatyagara. Allaha samu timro bhalo yasaima cha, ani usale timro galti mapha garidiyo. U nihsandeha ksamasila ra atyanta dayalu cha
